Text: Re Brandywine Meter March Activity Cc set the record straight Measurement was not contacted nor informed that the recorded flow was inaccurate We are dependent on the field to verify measurement information and absent information to the contrary the recorded volumes were published The HMS technician Charlie Speigel was contacted today and this issue was discussed and verified that he neglected to notify GMS of the erroneous recorded flow We will correct the statements to reflect zero flow based on this discussion From Gary A Hanks ECT PM To Lee L CT Robert E CT Pat NRON Earl CT cc Rita CT Howard B CT Daren J CT James CT Gary NRON Subject Brandywine Meter March Activity There was no flow at meter for the month of March The HMS technician did contact measurement once to get the volumes zeroed out but apparently he will have to get with them again I have notified the tech and he is in the process of doing this The meter is set on pressure control and the valve is open Gas Controls understanding and the fields understanding is that at the time the Brandywine deal ended some sort of standby agreement was in place If this is not the case please let me know and we will notify the plant and close the valve Robert In the future if you have meters like this where there is a small flow volume without a nomination in place please check with Earl and myself so we can investigate before we get commercial involved Thanks Gary H Forwarded by Gary A HanksHOUECT on PM From Lee L Papayoti on PM To Gary A CT James CT cc Robert E CT Subject Brandywine Meter March Activity How is this meter set up Why would it have flowed in March Any ideas Is it on pressure control If so whats the set point I need to know before I can go to Oxy andor DuPont and make a claim Forwarded by Lee L PapayotiHOUECT on PM From Robert E Lloyd PM To Lee L CT cc Daren J CT Pat NRON Rita CT Howard B CT Subject Brandywine Meter March Activity Attached is support that indicate gas flowed on a Zero nomination during the month of March There is no deal in place to allocate this gas flow Please advise me how you want this activity allocated
